mapper.select: SELECT sb.source_seq AS sourceSeq ,CC.CODE_NM AS langNm ,CC.CODE AS langCd ,WU.USER_ID AS userId ,sb.title ,sb.content ,DATE_FORMAT(sb.edit_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS editDate ,DATE_FORMAT(sb.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS regDate FROM source_board sb LEFT OUTER JOIN WHITE_USER WU ON WU.USER_SEQ = sb.USER_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CD CC ON sb.lang_cd = CC.CODE WHERE sb.source_seq = #{sourceSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO source_board(USER_SEQ, lang_cd, title, content, edit_date, reg_date) VALUES( #{userSeq}, #{langCd}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE source_board SET title = #{title}, lang_cd = #{langCd}, content = #{content}, edit_date = NOW() WHERE USER_SEQ = #{userSeq} AND source_seq = #{sourceSeq}
